entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 a.m. EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 6:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
